text: Kes is a 1969 British drama movie directed by Ken Loach and based on the 1968 novel A Kestrel for a Knave by Barry Hines. It stars Dai Bradley, Freddie Fletcher, Lynne Perrie, Colin Welland, Brian Glover, Duggie Brown and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:1960s British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ken Loach Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies about birds Category:Movies about bullying
title: Kes (movie)
